title: Many issues with Pixel XL sound systems.
content:
I got this cellphone (Pixel XL first generation) as a gift 2 years ago. It worked perfectly fine until six months ago. First, the microphone just didn't work sometimes. 

The time passed, and now whenever I tried to use the microphone in an app, the whole app crashes. I need to restart the phone one, two or even three times to get the microphone working again, altough some time later the microphone will present the same issue again and I have to repeat the process.

The headphones have also become an issue. Sometimes when using them I hear a "crack" sound, and the headphones I canÂ´t listen anything on them. If I disconnect the headphones, no sound comes out from the Pixel speaker until I restart the phone.

Finally, sometimes I connect the headphones to my cellphone, but the sound still comes from the speaker. 

I have already tried 3 times to factory reset my phone, and the problem has not been resolve yet. However, I doubt it is a hardware issue (or at least just hardware by itself), because:

-This issues are not present everytime.
-The microphone crashes the whole app, and not just records nothing. 

I don't know all the problems have the same origin, or they are caused by different issues.

Any help is appreciated.
